snippet: Rafael Nadal beat defending champion Kei Nishikori 6-4, 7-5 to win the Barcelona Open for the ninth time on Sunday, equaling Guillermo Vilas' record of 49 career clay-court titles....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal beat defending champion Kei Nishikori 6-4, 7-5 to win the Barcelona Open for the ninth time on Sunday, equaling Guillermo Vilas' record of 49 career clay-court titles.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Wins Barcelona Open, Equals Clay-Court Record
headline.main: Nadal Wins Barcelona Open, Equals Clay-Court Record
